definition: point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items

sentences.english: Microstructure of spot-welded joints are mainly composed of equiaxial grains.
sentences.chinese: 點焊接頭的金相組織主要由等軸晶構成。

sentences.english: Can you spot weld a tube to a sheet metal？
sentences.chinese: 你能把一個鋼管點焊到鋼板上嗎？

sentences.english: The test study is carried out difficultly because of the transient in aluminum alloy RSW.
sentences.chinese: 鋁合金電阻點焊的瞬時性給試驗研究帶來了困難。

sentences.english: The hot rinse assemblies are tack welded to the tray rim to keep them from moving.
sentences.chinese: 沖洗槽熱水槽被點焊在混凝土板邊緣防止其移動。

sentences.english: At same time, RSW quality judgment and classification can be implemented using statistic analysis.
sentences.chinese: 進而利用統計分析可以實現點焊質量判定與分類。

sentences.english: Spot welding requires both an electric current and a forging pressure to produce the weld.
sentences.chinese: 點焊需要電流及鍛壓來產生焊縫。

sentences.english: A Review of the Application of Invert Technology to the Resistance Spot Welding;
sentences.chinese: 設計了一種新型的電流型控制的逆變點焊機。

sentences.english: Reducing welding current and weld time were found to reduce electrode sticking.
sentences.chinese: 電極粘附力隨點焊電流和點焊時間的減小而下降。

sentences.english: Reducing welding current and weld time were found to reduce electrode sticking.
sentences.chinese: 電極粘附力隨點焊電流和點焊時間的減小而下降。

sentences.english: A new current control resistance welder with inversion is designed.
sentences.chinese: 設計了一種新型的電流型控制的逆變點焊機。

sentences.english: The performance of the new developed automatic spot welding machine for tantalum block queuing has been greatly enhanced.
sentences.chinese: 新研製的鉭芯自動成排點焊機性能有了很大提高。

sentences.english: Consequently, the technique of prolonging the electrode life of aluminum alloy spot welding is of reality significance.
sentences.chinese: 因此研究鋁合金點焊電極的延壽技術至關重要。

sentences.english: This paper discusses the source of heat for spot welding and the theory of diffusion welding of brass and red copper.
sentences.chinese: 探討了點焊熱量的來源和黃銅與紫銅的擴散焊機理。
